title: Sketchbook Folio, "The Apostles Carrying the Body of the Virgin to the Tomb, Study after Lodovico Carracci", 1813–18
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and dark brown wash over black chalk on white laid paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at lower margin: 32 Lodovico Caracci Parigi
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "The Apostles Carrying the Body of the Virgin to the Tomb, Study after Lodovico Carracci", 1813–18.
